Package com.brickgame

Brick Game with java This package contains the implementation of a client with some simple games.

Package com.brickgame Description

Brick Game with java

This package contains the implementation of a client with some simple games. The user will find:
  • A selector client
  • A snake game
  • A breakout game
  • An asteroids game
  • A tetris game
  • A high scores screen

All these elements were built using Block pixels in a 20x10 grid of squares.

License: MIT

Contact: mafigueiredo08@gmail.com

See also: README

Since:
1.8
